tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Trips (
    trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tourist_id INT,
    service_id INT,
    distance_km DECIMAL(10, 2),
    trip_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (tourist_id) REFERENCES Tourists(tourist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES TransportationServices(service_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Trips (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tourist_id INT,
  service_id INT,
  date_of_trip DATE,
  distance_travelled DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (tourist_id) REFERENCES Tourists(tourist_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (service_id) REFERENCES TransportServices(service_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TripFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trip_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES Trips(trip_id)
);
